name: Space Story (itch) (Harrison Bolin)
description:
Take a journey into the great beyond. In the year 20XX. three astronauts serve aboard the MNSS (Multi-National Space Station). For Rodriguez, this is a dream come true, but sinister discrepancies makes them think that something dangerous may be afoot...

Loosely based on this meme, read only after playing the game.

This game was created as part of the Tiny Games class at the ATLAS Institute at The University of Colorado Boulder
